Posts.Content: The biopsy results have come in and it is NEGATIVE!!!! They found that there is an area of tissue growth and they want me back for another MRI in 6 months...I guess they want to watch that area... Thank you everyone for all your help, thoughts and prayers while I walked this scary road! All of you are fighters! I will be praying for all of you!Â  God bless you all! ~Amanda
Posts.Title: Biopsy Results are in!
